# Targets Amt Issa




## Data setup

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(amt)
library(sf)
library(raster)

data("amt_fisher", package = 'amt')
data("amt_fisher_covar", package = 'amt')


fisher <- st_as_sf(amt_fisher, coords = c('x_', 'y_'), crs = 31467, remove = FALSE)
lc <- amt_fisher_covar$landuse
elev <- amt_fisher_covar$elevation
popdens <- amt_fisher_covar$popden

incrs <- CRS(st_crs(lc)$wkt)
crs(lc) <- incrs
crs(elev) <- incrs
crs(popdens) <- incrs

outcrs <- CRS(st_crs(4326)$wkt)

st_write(st_transform(fisher, 4326), 'input/amt_fisher_locs_4326.gpkg')
writeRaster(projectRaster(lc, crs = outcrs), 'input/amt_fisher_lc_4326.tif')
writeRaster(projectRaster(elev, crs = outcrs), 'input/amt_fisher_elev_4326.tif')
writeRaster(projectRaster(popdens, crs = outcrs), 'input/amt_fisher_popdens_4326.tif')
```
